channel.title: Bot on viz.
channel.description: Recent content in Bot on viz.

item.title: Minister Vlatin
item.description: Meet Minister Vlatin! @MinisterVlatin is WorldControl’s own Twitter-Bot, that grants you the possibility to turn your #FakeNewz into real Game-Events This is how it works: Tweet your news with the tags #fakenewz and @truWorldControl Include the intended game effect in [square brackets] @MinisterVlatin will take it from there! Example: @truWorldControl #fakenewz The Queen drowns in a cup of tea England sues India for bad taste. [ MUMBAI 70b > LONDON ]
